Are Avast and Kaspersky antivirus software flagging the software as a virus or malware?

No, Avast and Kaspersky are not flagging the software as a virus or malware. They may flag it as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program), which is a warning that you are installing mining software that could potentially be used by a third party to exploit your PC.
